rdf:Property.rdfs:label: Is Clip Of
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: A definition of the relationship between a timed media object and the timed media object from which it is derived, and wholly represented within. The subject is a fedora object representing a part and the predicate is a fedora object representing a whole.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: Has Clip
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: A definition of the relationship between a timed media object and a derivative timed media object, which is derived, and wholly represented within, the parent object. The subject is a fedora object representing a whole and the predicate is a fedora object representing a part.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: Is Episode Of
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: A definition of the relationship between a timed media object and the abstract object which forms the series, brand, collection or other aggregate of which it is a part. The subject is a fedora object representing an episode and the predicate is a fedora object representing the series, brand, collection or other aggregate.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: Has Clip
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: A definition of the relationship between a series, brand, collection or other aggregate and a derivative timed media object. The subject is a fedora object representing a series, brand, collection or other aggregate and the predicate is a fedora object representing an episode of this subject.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: Is Clip Of
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: A definition of the relationship between a timed media object or series and the brand, and wholly represented within. The subject is a fedora object representing a part and the predicate is a fedora object representing a whole.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: Has Clip
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: A definition of the relationship between a timed media object and a derivative timed media object, which is derived, and wholly represented within, the parent object. The subject is a fedora object representing a whole and the predicate is a fedora object representing a part.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: Is Clip Of
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: A definition of the relationship between a timed media object and the timed media object from which it is derived, and wholly represented within. The subject is a fedora object representing a part and the predicate is a fedora object representing a whole.

rdf:Property.rdfs:label: Has Clip
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: A definition of the relationship between a timed media object and a derivative timed media object, which is derived, and wholly represented within, the parent object. The subject is a fedora object representing a whole and the predicate is a fedora object representing a part.
